metadata.title: USN-5672-1 -- GMP vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that GMP did not properly manage memory on 32-bit platforms when processing a specially crafted input. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications using GMP to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5672-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libgmp10-doc - 2:6.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libgmpxx4ldbl - 2:6.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libgmp-dev - 2:6.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libgmp10 - 2:6.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 libgmp3-dev - 2:6.2.0+dfsg-4ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
